title: Samsung Galaxy A14
description: The Samsung Galaxy A14 offers 4GB/6GB RAM and 64GB/128GB storage, expandable up to 1TB via microSD. It features a 50MP triple-camera and a 5000mAh battery for all-day use

title: Samsung-Galaxy-S21-FE-5-G
description: The Samsung Galaxy S21 FE 5G offers 6GB/8GB of RAM and 128GB/256GB of internal storage. It features a 6.4-inch Dynamic AMOLED display, a 12MP triple-camera system, and a 4500mAh battery with fast charging support.

title: Galaxy A03 Core
description: The Samsung Galaxy A03 Core features 2GB RAM and 32GB storage, expandable up to 1TB via microSD. It includes an 8MP rear camera and a 5000mAh battery for extended use.

title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold4 5G
description: The Samsung Galaxy Z Fold4 5G offers 12GB of RAM and 256GB/512GB/1TB of internal storage. It features a foldable 7.6-inch AMOLED display, a triple-camera system, and a 4400mAh battery with fast charging.

title: Samsung-Galaxy-Note-20
description: The Samsung Galaxy Note 20 comes with 8GB of RAM and 128GB/256GB of internal storage. It features a 6.7-inch Super AMOLED display, a 64MP triple-camera system, and a 4300mAh battery with fast charging.

title: Smart Digital watch
description: Stylish smartwatch that tracks fitness, heart rate, and notifications, keeping you connected on the go. With customizable watch faces and long battery life, its perfect for both workouts and daily wear.

title: Samsung Galaxy A13
